backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and per‑user manga CRUD operations with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files for build planning.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth initialization, profile setup flow, and rendering the manga list page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Global app layout with header, footer, and central content area including login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist verifying Add Manga dialog layout behavior, header/footer pinning, and 400px scrollable body.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Form dialog for creating a new manga entry, handling input fields, validation, backend submission, and state reset.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Manages uploading, previewing, and removing cover images, including progress tracking and blob conversion.
Displays a compact manga entry card with cover, titles, rating, progress, completion status, and genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides search, genre filtering, bookmark filtering, and sorting controls for the manga list.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list page that loads entries, applies filters and sorting, paginates results, and manages the add dialog.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Renders pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and handles page navigation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useBackendConnection and exposes actor state plus retry and readiness metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries using the backend actor with authentication and retry gating.
Manages backend actor creation, readiness checks, retries, and error classification with timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Maps backend connection state into a simplified readiness status interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile with backend readiness awareness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Derives a sorted unique genre list from all manga entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Defines mutations to add, update, and delete manga entries with backend readiness checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a paginated manga page using the backend actor with auth and retry rules.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories and exposes helpers for retry logic and user messages.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides TimeoutError and helpers to wrap promises with a hard timeout or generate timeout-only promises.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements bounded exponential backoff with retry logic, per-attempt timeouts, and a retry manager class.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values with hash and query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versioning, and a list of implemented features for the IC dapp template.
